ing: 1 pound ahi tuna, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste
2 teaspoons sesame oil, or more to taste
1 teaspoon sriracha sauce, or to taste
des: "A traditional poke salad with a spicy kick. Enjoy as an appetizer or as a lunch and dinner over lettuce."
ins: Combine tuna, green onion, macadamia nuts, cilantro, lime juice, sesame oil, ginger, red pepper flakes, and sriracha sauce in a bowl; refrigerate for 2 hours.
